com.mlt.task

Class Task

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.task.Task
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FileCopy, FileScanner, SampleTask, TaskPool, Trainer

    public abstract class Task
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>
    A Runnable and Callable<Void> task that publishes states and messages.

    Four string messages are published:

    • title, a user task title.
    • message, a user message.
    • progressMessage, an internally and standard updated progress message.
    • timeMessage, an internally and standard updated time message.
    A list of additional messages tagged by key can also be defined.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
